question.title: Spring boot runtime error: Consider defining a bean of type 'org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.HealthEndpoint' in your configuration
question.body:
I am getting error on spring-boot runtime. Here is error body:

***************************
APPLICATION FAILED TO START
***************************

Description:

Parameter 0 of constructor in HiddenClass required a bean of type 'org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.HealthEndpoint' that could not be found.


Action:

Consider defining a bean of type 'org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.HealthEndpoint' in your configuration.

answers.body:
check whether you have disabled health endpoint or not. check you application.properties file for this

management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=health

check whether you have added spring-boot-starter-actuator dependency.

For Maven:

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId>
</dependency>

also please check HealthEndpoint is defined externally or your spring boot autoconfiguration is allowed via annotation

@EnableAutoConfiguration.
